1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A spring comes. Ivan Bugko decided to take up large floral business. To engage and engage in the enterprise of all domestic. Business by business, but also about gifts favourite wives can not forget to eighth March. Ivan and his faithful friend Mityai try to surprise the second halves an original gift.

Zhenya teaches a teacher to colloquial English. And at this time San Sanych Berkovich becomes the victim of the own drawing.

3.title: Episode #1.3

4.title: Episode #1.4

Taking advantage of that Lorik put in a hospital, Mityai arranges to itself vacation - And disappears. And while Larisa tears off telephone in search of husband, all weight of preparation of house of Buhankin to addition in family lies down on the shoulders of Bugko.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Many disbelieve in the enigmatic phenomena. But Mityai, Ivan and the twins had the luck to meet on their way clairvoyant. Well and that did an usual goat appear by her? But this meeting happened on the eve of Eurocup.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Ivan and San Sanych send Olga and Valentina in a cruise on Volga. Taking advantage of absence of wives, leave on "Euro-2012". And Zhenya and Katya, taking advantage of absence both, and by naivety of Leha, leave to bath at the seaside. Keen adventures begin in style of road movie.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Family of Berkovich-Kovalevy appears on the bottom of financial crisis. To the salary to live and live, and all money is inlaid in a mortgage. And a chancellor, his chief accountant and their minor dependants, appear in ticklish position, when all is as though, but at the same time of nothing it is.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: No, did not disappear yet from earth Russian athletes epic. And one of them is Ivan Bugko. Ivan rescues a harvest, district and whole country.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Family of Bugko-Kovalevy-Berkovich leaves on domestic team building. By the way, he coincides wonderful character with the anniversary gathering of tourist club "Romantica", where Berkovich presides. Appearing in the unbearably comfort terms of tourist base,"Matchmakers" run into ancient mystic legend of the dark forests of Kuchugurshyna.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: In this series of Bugko and Mityai coming to meet with a new threat in the person of Larisa's mother. Loving mother-in-law takes in slavery of Mityai and patronage above a grandchild Artem. How to liberate a friend and banish mother-in-law from the house of Buhankiny - this question is baffle Ivan.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: First September. A great deal in life of family on this day takes place first time. Zhenya first time goes to the institute. The grand-dads of grandmother run into beginning of her adult life. Budko in the first time remain homeless. And Ivan in the first time starts working of detective.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: In a house Berkovich played off the real Spanish passions : love, jealousy, suspicion. And all this on a background the forthcoming wedding. And meantime Ivan left after "a long" rouble in a nearby village. Valentina remains one on one with the loneliness.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Large changes come in life of Zhenya. She meets the first real love. But the heart of girl not give up to the escort without a fight. There is a spy in the camp of Zhenya - a grandmother Valya too fights for happiness of grandchild.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Rainy autumn. Lady-cats scrape on the soul of Ivan. An anniversary is approached, and with his approaching the mood of Budko becomes yet more sour. Olga Nikolaevna takes up the antidepressed measures. And Valya takes up the husband of Olga Nikolaevna hedgehog mittens.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Not after mountains New Year. "Fir-trees of "TT Bu-Bu" begin for Ivan and Mityai. Meantime, to call on children Masha - mother of Zhenya and twins arrives. However to unhinge a mother the failed session of daughter? Grandmothers have to meddle in the real spy game.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: That can be merrier, than meeting of New Year all family on a skiing resort?. Adventure of this family thereon skiing resort three days prior to this Newest Year. Olga Nikolaevna meets an old escort, Alekseich arranges pursuit after Leha, Ivan tries on the suit of Grandfather Moroz. A holiday all nearer and nearer, and Budko-Kovalevy-Berkovich has all more problems.
